Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.name: leftPadding
Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.abstract: The amount of padding from the left handside, used to layout the titleLabel, default is 8.0

Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.name: rightPadding
Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.abstract: The amount of padding from the right handside, used to layout the button, default is 8.0

Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.name: seperatorHeightPercent
Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.abstract: The height percent of the total available size that the seperator should take up inside the view.

Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.name: seperatorWidth
Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.abstract: The width for the seperator, default is 1.5

Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.name: seperatorPadding
Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.abstract: The amount of padding from the right side of the seperator (next to the button), default is 20.0

Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.name: titleLabel
Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.abstract: The label on the left hand side of the view used to display text.

Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.name: button
Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.abstract: The button on the right hand side of the view which allows an action to be performed.

Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.name: seperator
Classes/LPSnackbarView.html#/s:10LPSnack.abstract: A small view which adds an accent that seperates the titleLabel and the button.

Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.name: view
Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.abstract: The LPSnackbarView for the controller, access this view and it’s subviews to do any additional customization.

Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.name: widthPercent
Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.abstract: The width percent of the total available size that the view should take up.

Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.name: stackedBottomSpacing
Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.abstract: Similar to the bottomSpacing property, except this is only used when multiple LPSnackbarViews are stacked.

Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.name: viewToDisplayIn
Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.abstract: Optional view to display the view in, by default this is nil, thus the main UIWindow is used for presentation.

Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.name: animationDuration
Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.abstract: The duration for the animation of both the adding and removal of the view.

Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.name: SnackbarCompletion
Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.abstract: The completion block for an LPSnackbar, true is sent if button was tapped, false otherwise.

Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.name: dismiss(animated:completeWithAction:)
Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.abstract: Allows you to manually dismiss the snack from the screen.

Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.name: showSnack(title:displayDuration:completion:)
Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.abstract: Allows showing a simple snack without needing to instantiate any LPSnackbar

Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.name: showSnack(attributedTitle:displayDuration:completion:)
Classes/LPSnackbar.html#/s:10LPSnackbarA.abstract: Allows showing a simple, more customizable, snack without needing to instantiate any LPSnackbar
Returns equals if and only if lhs and rhs are the same object.
